loans.name: Prueng's Group

texts.en: Prueng’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Prueng makes a living cultivating rice, raising pigs and dong extra work as farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ran's Group

texts.en: Ran’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Ran makes a living cultivating rice with her family and doing extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Reina Teodora

texts.es: Reina de 30 años de edad vive con su esposo  y su hijo, ella es muy una mujer trabajadora y responsable, tienen una tienda desde hace algunos años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Reina está solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de productos para su tienda como: granos básicos, sopas, golosinas, refrescos, jabón, detergentes, etc.  y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
30-year old Reina lives with her husband and son. She is a very hardworking responsible woman who has run a store for several years. Her income pays for many household expenses.

Reina is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL to buy products for the store: grains, soup, candy, soft drinks, soap, detergent etc. Then she will be able to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy grains, soup, candy, soft drinks, soap, detergent etc.

loans.name: Louth's Group

texts.en: Louth’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Louth makes a living cultivating rice, selling groceries and doing motorcycle repairs to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Chanthy's Group

texts.en: Chanthy’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Chanthy makes a living cultivating rice and selling groceries from home to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Ekram

texts.en: Ekram is a 40-year-old married woman and mother of five children. She has been working for five years at her house, selling dairy products to help her family meet the needs of life. She is receiving a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas. s.a.l., to improve her business merchandise and offer clients quality products. She is very certain that she will sell all of her products and expand her business. She hopes that in the future, she might open her own store and attract more customers.

loans.use: to improve her dairy business merchandise

loans.name: Nohema Del Ada

texts.es: Nohema de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja en una empresa privada, ella  tiene una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la variedad de los productos que comercializa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar  las necesidades de su hogar, Nohema  solicita un crédito para la compra de productos para surtir la tienda  como: grano básicos, golosinas, sopas, refrescos, azúcar, etc. para tener junto con su esposo  una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Nohema is 34 years old and lives with her husband, who works for a private company.  She has a store that is located in her home.  She has a lot of customers due to her good prices and the variety of products that she sells.  With her earnings she manages to meet her household expenses.  She is seeking a loan in order to purchase products to stock her store, such as staple food items, candies, soups and soft drinks.  This will enable her and her husband to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase staple food items, candies, soups, soft drinks, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Guadalupana Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario integrado por tres socios laboriosos, coordinado por la señora Bertha de 41 años de edad y soltera, quien comercializa ropa nueva a los pobladores de su comunidad; este negocio lo impulso desde hace ocho años y le ha permitido cubrir partes de los gastos familiares, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de mercadería como es camisetas, licras, talladores, jean para damas y caballeros, blusas, shorts, ropa interior, etc., con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos. Los otros integrantes del grupo son la señora Rosa de 53 años de edad, dedicada a la venta de hojas en los merados de la capital y el señor Luis de 56 años de edad, comerciante de cosechas de frutas y verduras en el mercado de la municipalidad y niquinohomo desde hace seis años.
texts.en:
This group is formed of three hardworking members who have a great deal of solidarity with each other.  The group is led by Bertha, who is a single 41-year-old woman.  She sells new clothing to the members of her community.  She started this business eight years ago, and it has enabled her to cover a portion of her household expenses.

She is seeking a loan in order to purchase T-shirts, tights, jeans for men and women, blouses, shorts, underwear and other items, with the aim of increasing her income. 

The other members of the group are:

Rosa, who is 53 and sells paper in the markets in the capital city

Luis, who is 56 and has sold fruits and vegetables in the local markets and in the city of Niquinohomo for the last six years

loans.use: to purchase T-shirts, tights, jeans for men and women, blouses, shorts, underwear and other items.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 64 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, actualmente está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene ya tres hijos y todos son mayores de edad y están acompañados, de Jaime solo dependen su esposa y una nieta.


Jaime tiene ya 20 años de experiencia en el trabajo de la agricultura, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres que lo llevaban al campo para que les ayudara, además de vez en alguien lo busca para que vaya rajar leña y así obtiene otra fuente de ingresos, el lugar donde siembra le queda a 2 kilómetros de su casa y el horario de trabajo es de 6 a 12 del mediodía.


El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar los insumos para la siembra del maíz, quiere aprovechar que le han vendido un terreno y por lo tanto ahí realizará la siembra.


Para un futuro él tiene pensado sembrar una hectárea mas, espera que Dios le de larga vida y poder criar a su nieta.
texts.en:
Jaime is 64 years old. He did not get the opportunity to study. He is married and his wife looks after the home, he has three children, all grown up with partners, only his wife and a granddaughter depend on him.

Jaime has 20 years’ experience working in agriculture, he learned from his parents who took him to the fields so he could help them. In addition to this from time to time people ask him to chop firewood and this gives him another source of income. The land where he grows his crops is 2 kilometres from his house and he works from 6am until 12 midday.

He needs the loan he is asking for to buy inputs for the sowing of corn. He wishes to take advantage of land he has been sold, and will plant the corn there.

In the future he plans to sow one extra hectare. He hopes that God grants him a long life and he is able to look after his granddaughter.

loans.use: to buy inputs for the sowing of corn.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Victoria requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for 39 years now.

Victoria would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Narcisa is 61 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Narcisa has a food vending business in the Philippines. Narcisa requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Narcisa has been in this business for two years. In the future, Narcisa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ma. Lisa

texts.en:
Ma. Lisa is 52 years old and married with four children. 

She is in the agricultural business doing pig fattening in the Philippines. Ma. Lisa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ma. Lisa has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Ma. Lisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Bourama

texts.en:
Bourama , is a farmer who lives in the village of Bananzole in southern Mali. He is fifty-four years old and married with six children. Konimba grows corn, sorghum and peanuts. 
With a loan from Kiva, Bourama would be able to buy a semoir. A semoir is a type of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer following the modern agricultural method of micro-dosing. By using a semoir to plant his field, Bourama would be able to decrease the amount of time he spends planting his field and would be able to ensure that he follows modern methods, resulting in a larger harvest. With a larger harvest, Bourama would be able to ensure that his family has enough to eat. He also said that if he has a surplus, he would like to help make sure his neighbors have enough to eat.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Chacha

texts.en:
Chacha  is fifty-two years old and is married with twelve children. He lives in the village of Marako in southern Mali. He is a farmer and grows corn, cotton, and millet on his eight hectares. 
Chacha would like a loan to be able to purchase a semoir machine, so that he can plant both seed and fertilizer at the same time. With a semoir, he will be able to plant his land faster, which means that he will no longer have to hire people to help him plant. The semoir will save Chacha and his family both time and money.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Seriba

texts.en:
Seriba  is a forty-three year old farmer from the village of Bananzole in southern Mali. Seriba is the married father of four children. On his six hectares of land he grows corn.
With a loan from Kiva, Seriba would be able to buy a semoir, which is a piece of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer following a modern agricultural method. Seriba wants a semoir so that he can reduce the amount of time it takes for him to plant his land. Currently, Seriba plants his seed and fertilizer by hand, which can take up to one week to plant one hectare. With a semoir, he will be able to cut the amount of time it takes him to plant in more than half. In addition, the semoir will help ensure that he follows a modern planting method, enabling him to increase his harvest and earn additional income.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Bakary

texts.en:
Bakary  is a farmer who lives in Zambougou village in southern Mali. He is married and has six children. Bakary grows corn, sorghrum, millet, peanuts, and vegetables. 
With a loan from Kiva, Bakary will buy a semoir, a piece of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer according to a modern agricultural method. With a semoir, Bakary will be able to plant his land faster. In addition, the semoir will help ensure that he follows the modern agricultural method of micro-dosing. By following the method of micro-dosing he will be able to dramatically increase his harvest. With an increase in harvest, he hopes to be able to increase his income and invest in planting more fields.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Souleymane

texts.en:
Souleymane is from the village of Marako in southern Mali. He is forty years old and is the married father of six children. Souleymane is a farmer and grows corn, chili, cucumber, okra, peanuts, and rice. 

With Kiva loan Souleymane will buy a semoir, a piece of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer at the same time. A semoir would enable Souleymen to plant his land faster and would eliminate the need for him to hire workers to help plant his field. Because it takes so long to plant and fertilize his fields by hand, Souleymane has land that lies idle. But with a semoir, Souleymane hopes that he will be able to increase the amount of land he plants, which means that he will have more food to feed his growing children.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Yiriba

texts.en:
Yiriba is a seventy-two year old farmer from the village of Marako in southern Mali. He is married and the father of eight children. Yiriba is a farmer and grows corn, millet, and peanuts. 
With a loan from Kiva, Yiriba would be able to buy a semoir, which is a piece of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer. With a semoir Yiriba will no longer have to hire people to help him plant his field by hand. Rather, he will be able to operate the semoir and quickly plant his field. Due to how quickly a semoir plants a field, Yiriba believes he will able to increase the amount of land he cultivates every year, which will mean more food for his family.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Konimba

texts.en:
Yiriba is a seventy-two year old farmer from the village of Marako in southern Mali. He is married and the father of eight children. Yiriba is a farmer and grows corn, millet, and peanuts. 
With a loan from Kiva, Yiriba would be able to buy a semoir, which is a piece of agricultural equipment that plants seed and fertilizer. With a semoir Yiriba will no longer have to hire people to help him plant his field by hand. Rather, he will be able to operate the semoir and quickly plant his field. Due to how quickly a semoir plants a field, Yiriba believes he will able to increase the amount of land he cultivates every year, which will mean more food for his family.

loans.use: to buy a semoir

loans.name: Julia Emilia

texts.es: Julia de 40 años de edad vive con su esposo en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, adicional a eso posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Julia está solicitando  un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas,  etc.y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía, para tener junto con su esposo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julia is 40 years old and live with her husband in her own home.  She grows rice and beans, and she also has a store in her home.  With the income that she and her husband make, they are able to meet their household expenses.  She is seeking a loan in order to buy farming supplies such as fertilizers, compost, insecticides and other items, and to make improvements to the land shown in the photo. This will lead to a better quality of life for her and her husband.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, compost, insecticides and other items, and to make improvements to her land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, adhesive, varnish, and cane.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Amalia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a coffin-making business in the Philippines.

Amalia requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase materials like paint, wood, nails, etc. for her business.

She has been in this business for three years now.

Amalia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials like paint, wood, and nails for her business

loans.name: Adilio Antonio

texts.es:
Adilio tiene 36 años de edad, no sabe leer ni escribir ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de ir a la escuela, hoy en día está acompañado y su apareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuidado de sus dos hijos que aún no van a la escuela por lo que están de pendiendo en totalidad de Adilio.   


Adilio se dedica a la agricultura, en la zona no existe otra fuente de ingresos, en el desarrollo del trabajo no 
tiene quien le ayude ya que sus hijos están pequeños por lo que él trabaja solo todo el día. 



El crédito  que solicita es para comprar una vaca lechera, esto para ayudar a la alimentación de su familia.

Su sueño es tener aunque sea una vaca para elaborar queso todos los días para sus hijos, y además espera darles la oportunidad de estudiar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Adilio is 36 years old.  He doesn't know how to read or write since he didn't have the opportunity to go to school.  He is currently partnered and his partner takes care of the household chores and caring for their two children who don't go to school yet, and for this are entirely dependent on Adilio. 

Ailio works in agriculture; in his area there aren't any other sources of income, and there isn't anyone who can help him do his work since his children are still small, and for this he works alone all day. 

The loan he requests is to purchase a dairy cow, which will help to feel his family. 

His dream is to have a cow to make cheese every day for his children, and in addition he wants to give his children the opportunity to go to school.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Gunel

texts.en:
Gunel is a 35-year-old married woman with two kids. Gunel has a garden, and she earns money raising and selling seasonal fruits at a local bazaar. After working for 7 years, she has strong skills in this area. Her monthly income is 100 AZN. 

Raising seasonal fruits is very popular in Azerbaijan because there is a high demand for fresh fruits. People use fruits to make juice, jam, fruit pies, and fruit cocktails. People frequent Gunel’s grocery because the fruit is always fresh and tasty. 

Gunel has a hard life. She needs money to pay for her  son’s education and cover living costs. She has applied for a 1,000 AZN loan in order to buy good quality fertilizers and vegetable seeds. She plans to raise both fruits and vegetables and expand the grocery's assortment. This will increase Gunel's monthly income.

loans.use: to buy good quality fertilizers and vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Maynor Antonio

texts.es: Maynor de 32 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa propia, el  se dedica a la venta de accesorios para cumpleaños como piñatas, dulces, bolsitas, sorpresas, juguetes, etc.  y adicional a eso también vende producto de bisutería, ropa y útiles escolares,  con lo que vende logra cubrir los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Maynor solicita un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para seguir con sus ventas que le generan buenas ganancias y así tener un mejor nivel de vida junto con su esposa.
texts.en: Maynor, 32 years old, lives with his wife in his own house. He works selling birthday party supplies such as piñatas, candies, small bags, surprises, toys, etc. In addition to this, he also sells costume jewelry, clothing, and school supplies.  With what he sells, he manages to cover the expenses that arise in his household. Maynor asks for a loan to purchase more merchandise in bulk to continue with his sales so they generate good profit and, in that way, improve the quality of life for himself and his wife.

loans.use: to purchase piñatas, candies, small bags, surprises, toys, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Kelvin Rafael

texts.es: Kelvin de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y una  hija, el posee un negocio de enderezado y pintura ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace 9 años, con lo que obtiene de sus trabajos logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Kelvin está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pintura, barniz, aceites, y demás herramientas para seguir con su trabajo y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Kelvin, 33 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and daughter.  He has owned a bodywork and painting business, located in the place where he lives, for the past 9 years, and with what he gets from his work he manages to pay some of the household expenses.  Kelvin is asking for this loan to purchase paint, varnish, oils, and other tools to continue with his work and, so, to get more earnings to give his family a better quality of life without limitations.

loans.use: to purchase paint, varnish, oils and other tools.

loans.name: Blanca Rubia

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 54 años de edad, estudió solo segundo año de educación Básica, hoy en día está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 3 hijos pero ya viven en sus propios hogare. 


Blanca tiene varios años de atender una mini tienda, la idea nació ya que en la colonia no existía ninguna otra tienda, el negocio lo abre desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche pues venden granos básicos y los habitantes van a comprar en todo momento.


El préstamo solicitado lo necesita para comprar granos básicos como lo es maíz y frijol ya que ella lo revende por libras y se está quedando sin productos.

Su sueño más grande es tener una tienda muy surtida donde los clientes encuentren todo lo que buscan, y que su esposo ya deje de trabajar en la tierra por su edad avanzada.
texts.en:
Blanca is 54 years old, she only studied up to the second year of basic education. She is in a common law marriage and her partner works in agriculture. She has 3 children who all now live in their own homes.

Blanca has run a very small shop for several years, the idea started because in the local area there was no other shop. The business opens from 5 in the morning until 7 in the evening, as she sells basic grains which people come to buy at all times.

She is asking for the loan to buy basic grains such as corn and beans that she resells by the pound, and she is running out of products.

Her dream is to have a very varied shop where her customers can find everything they are looking for, and that her husband can stop working the land, because of his advanced age.

loans.use: to buy basic grains such as corn and beans that she resells by the pound, and she is running out of products.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un hombre de 55 años de edad, es jornalero, estudio hasta tercer grado,  por motivos de fuerza mayor no pudo seguir estudiando, está casado , su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Santos se dedica a este oficio (jornalero), desde hace mucho tiempo, se lo enseño su padre para que se defendiera en la vida dignamente, a él se le hace difícil conseguir otro trabajo debido al nivel académico que tiene y es por eso que haciendo este oficio tiene  fuente de ingreso.

Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de una motocicleta, que será su medio de transporte para desplazarse a su lugar de trabajo.

El sueño a un futuro es mejorar la calidad de vida para su familia, ya que son de muy bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Santos is a 55-year-old man. He is a day laborer and went to school up to the third grade; because of unforeseeable circumstances he couldn't continue studying.  He is married and his wife takes care of the household duties. 

Santos has worked in this field (day laborer) for a long time.  His father taught it to him so that he could hold his own in a dignified life.  It is difficult for him to get another job due to his academic level and, because of this, doing this work is his source of income. 

He will use the loan to purchase a motorcycle which will be his means of transportation to get to his worksite. 

His dream is that in the future he will improve his family's quality of life, since they have very limited economic resources.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Wynie

texts.en:
Lovie Jay is 16 years old and is second of two children in his family. His mother Wynie, who is a member of NWTF, supports the family through her retail business in the Philippines.

Lovie Jay is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education and is currently in his first year of this four-year program.

Wynie, Lovie Jay's mother, is borrowing 6,335 PHP to pay for the first semester tuition fees of the school year 2014-15. Lovie Jay plans to graduate and be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Leonidas Group

texts.es: Grupo solidario integrado por tres socios laboriosos y coordinado por la señora Fátima de 35 años de edad, acompañada, comerciante de frutas y verduras en su domicilio desde hace tres años cuando realizo un préstamo a su hermana para la compra de perecederos en menor cantidad, desde entonces comenzó a reinvertir las ganancias para aumentar dicho negocio, lo que la ha motivado solicitar créditos  en esta institución para la compra de tomate, chayote, yuca y plátano verde, con el fin de seguir aumentando los productos ofrecidos. Los otros socios son la señora Narcisa de 49 años de edad, quien se dedica a la venta de nacatamales en su domicilio y por encargo en la capital desde hace veinticinco años, y el señor Mercedes de 28 años de edad propietario de una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
This supportive group has three hard-working members and is coordinated by Señora Fátima. She is 35 years old, married, and she is a fruits and vegetables vendor who sells her produce out of her home. She has done this for the past three years, ever since she took out a loan from her sister for the purchase of seasonal fruits in small quantities. Since that time, she has invested her profits to grow her business and this has motivated her to request a loan from this microfinance institution for the purchase of tomatoes, pear squash, tapioca root, and green plantains with the goal of expanding her inventory. 

The other group members include Señora Narcisa, 49 years old, who has made her living selling nacatamales in her home and buying and traveling to the capital to buy and sell goods for special orders for the past 25 years. The other member is Señor Mercedes, 28 years old, who runs a small grocery store in his home.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine and fabric.

loans.name: Qotna

texts.en:
Qotna is a married woman in her 50s. She lives with her retired husband and their daughter in Al Karak/ Jordan.

Two years ago, she started her own business selling food stuffs and general products at her home. Then she opened a small shop, but due to the demand for goods especially in Ramadan, the holy month, she applied for a loan to help her with funding.

loans.use: to buy more food stuffs and general products for her business

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 27-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and only daughter in Irbed, Jordan. Besides the fact that living costs in Jordan have increased given the demand driven by Syrian refugees, it was hard for Mariam to find a job. So she opened her own project, which became her family's source of income, and she is seeking to expand it.

She now has a salon inside her home and she has also sold clothes for the past three years. When she faced a lack of funding, she applied for a loan to help her buy new clothes and more tools for her beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and tools for her beauty salon

loans.name: Sana'

texts.en:
Sana’ is a 45-year-old married woman who lives in Madaba, Jordan with her husband, who works as a contractor, and their three daughters and three sons.

Five years ago she started to sell clothes and blankets in order to assist her husband whose income wasn't enough to cover his children's needs. Due to the increase in demand for her products, she applied for this loan to get more clothes and blankets so it can affect her income.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and blankets for her business

loans.name: Abdulbari

texts.en:
Abdulbari is a 31-year-old married man with only one child, living with his family in Sana'a,Yemen. He studied till secondary school.
 
Abdulbari spent many years as a driver of his friend's taxi. His salary from that business was very low, and it was not enough to cover all the expenses of his family. In time, he accumulated a good amount of money in order to begin his own business. This business is purchasing and driving a taxi to improve the living standards of his family. He conveys the people to many places and streets of the capital city of Sana'a. He earns good profits from this business. He works 19 hours daily and Sunday to Sunday. His taxi became very tired and also old. It needs to be repaired and maintained. For this reason, Abdulbari is requesting a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB in order to repair and maintain his taxi.
	
Abdulbari looks forward to purchasing a new taxi that will help him tp improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his taxi.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn.
